mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ROLE NOT IN ('STUDENT')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t.* FROM ( SELECT m.MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, m.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, m.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, c.CLASS_NAME AS className, m.PHONE AS phone,
/* üî• Ï∂úÏÑùÎ•† (ÏóÜÏúºÎ©¥ 0%) */ NVL( ROUND( SUM( CASE WHEN a.ATTEND_STATUS = 'Ï∂úÏÑù' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * 100.0 / CASE WHEN COUNT(a.ATTEND_NO) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE COUNT(a.ATTEND_NO) END ), 0) AS attendRate,
m.STATUS AS status
FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CLASS_STUDENT cs ON m.MEMBER_NO = cs.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS c ON cs.CLASS_NO = c.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN ATTEND a ON cs.STUDENT_NO = a.STUDENT_NO
WHERE UPPER(m.ROLE) = 'STUDENT'
GROUP BY m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, c.CLASS_NAME, m.PHONE, m.STATUS
ORDER BY m.MEMBER_NAME ) t ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE UPPER(ROLE) = 'STUDENT'

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, NVL(L.LECTURE_NAME, 'ÏàòÏóÖX') AS LECTURE_NAME, M.PHONE, NVL( ROUND( (SUM(CASE WHEN C.COMMUTE_STATUS IN ('IN', 'LATE', 'HALF') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100, 1), 0 ) AS COMMUTE_RATE, CASE WHEN M.ROLE = 'ADMIN' THEN 'Í¥ÄÎ¶¨Ïûê' ELSE 'Í∞ïÏÇ¨' END AS ROLE, CASE WHEN M.STATUS = 'Y' THEN 'Ïû¨ÏßÅ' ELSE 'Ìá¥ÏÇ¨' END AS STATUS, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS COMMUTE_MONTH FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN LECTURE L ON M.MEMBER_NO = L.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN COMMUTE C ON M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND TRUNC(C.COMMUTE_DATE, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') WHERE M.ROLE NOT IN ('STUDENT') GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, L.LECTURE_NAME, M.PHONE, M.ROLE, M.STATUS ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NAME

SELECT C.CLASS_NAME, C.CLASS_NO, LC.PLAN_DATE FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_LECTURE CL ON C.CLASS_NO = CL.CLASS_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON CL.LECTURE_NO = L.LECTURE_NO JOIN LECTURE_CONTROL LC ON CL.CLASS_LECTURE_NO = LC.CLASS_LECTURE_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(LC.PLAN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND L.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT C.CLASS_NAME, C.CLASS_NO, C.MEMBER_COUNT, LC.CONTROLL_NO FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_LECTURE CL ON C.CLASS_NO = CL.CLASS_NO JOIN LECTURE_CONTROL LC ON CL.CLASS_LECTURE_NO = LC.CLASS_LECTURE_NO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, CS.STUDENT_NO, C.CLASS_NAME, A.ATTEND_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN CLASS_STUDENT CS ON M.MEMBER_NO = CS.MEMBER_NO JOIN CLASS C ON CS.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTEND A ON A.STUDENT_NO = CS.STUDENT_NO AND TO_CHAR(A.ATTEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTEND( ATTEND_NO, ATTEND_STATUS, SESSION_NO, STUDENT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, #{attendStatus}, #{sessionNo}, #{studentNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT TRUNC(ATTEND_DATE) AS ATTEND_DATE, SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'ATTEND' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ATTEND_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'LATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LATE_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'ABSENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ABSENT_COUNT, ROUND( ( (SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'ATTEND' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'LATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS IN ('ATTEND','LATE','ABSENT') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) * 100), 2 ) AS ATTEND_RATE FROM ATTEND WHERE TRUNC(ATTEND_DATE) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY TRUNC(ATTEND_DATE) ORDER BY TRUNC(ATTEND_DATE)
select ATTEND_STATUS, COUNT(STUDENT_NO) AS ATTEND_COUNT FROM ATTEND GROUP BY ATTEND_STATUS

SELECT TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS ATTEND_MONTH, SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'ATTEND' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ATTEND_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'LATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LATE_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'ABSENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ABSENT_COUNT, ROUND( ( (SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'ATTEND' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS = 'LATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN ATTEND_STATUS IN ('ATTEND','LATE','ABSENT') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) * 100 ), 2 ) AS ATTEND_RATE FROM ATTEND WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT U.ATTEND_UPDATE_NO, U.ATTEND_UPDATE_CONTENT, U.CORRECTION_APPLICATION_DATE, U.STATUS, U.REFUSAL, ST.MEMBER_NAME AS studentName, CASE WHEN F.ATTEND_UPDATE_FILE_NO IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS hasFile FROM ATTEND_UPDATE U /* Ï∂úÍ≤∞ ‚Üí ÌïôÏÉù */ JOIN ATTEND A ON U.ATTEND_NO = A.ATTEND_NO /* ÌïôÏÉù ‚Üî Î∞ò */ JOIN CLASS_STUDENT CS ON A.STUDENT_NO = CS.STUDENT_NO /* ÌïôÏÉù(Member) */ JOIN MEMBER ST ON CS.MEMBER_NO = ST.MEMBER_NO JOIN LECTURE_CONTROL LC ON A.SESSION_NO = LC.CONTROLL_NO JOIN CLASS_LECTURE CL ON LC.CLASS_LECTURE_NO = CL.CLASS_LECTURE_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON CL.LECTURE_NO = L.LECTURE_NO /* Ï≤®Î∂ÄÌååÏùº */ LEFT JOIN ATTEND_UPDATE_FILE F ON U.ATTEND_UPDATE_NO = F.ATTEND_UPDATE_NO /* ‚òÖ Í∞ïÏÇ¨ Î≤àÌò∏Î°ú ÌïÑÌÑ∞ÎßÅ (Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏Ìïú Í∞ïÏÇ¨) */ WHERE L.MEMBER_NO = #{teacher_no} ORDER BY U.ATTEND_UPDATE_NO DESC

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO AS APPROVER_MEMBER_NO, A.ATTEND_NO FROM ATTEND A JOIN CLASS_STUDENT CS ON A.STUDENT_NO = CS.STUDENT_NO JOIN LECTURE_CONTROL LC ON A.SESSION_NO = LC.CONTROLL_NO JOIN CLASS_LECTURE CL ON LC.CLASS_LECTURE_NO = CL.CLASS_LECTURE_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON CL.LECTURE_NO = L.LECTURE_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON L.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(A.ATTEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{correctionApplicationDate} AND CS.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
